column1: Kata Robata////We ordered so much food I'm struggling to remember all the dishes but everything was up to par. Seaweed salad was good
column2: Hamachi Kama was awesome and meaty
column3: spicy tuna was good and had just the right amount of spicy-ness
column4: the rising sun roll was had very interesting flavors with the pepper tuna and truffle vinaigrette
column6: the king crab california roll was actually my favorite item of the night - so much delicious crab meat stuffed in there! Â We got the green tea creme brulee for dessert (I thought Pagoda was the only place in town that offered this so it was a pleasant surprise)
column7: the dish very well done and even came with a serving of green tea ice cream.
